title: Camel Core
desc: Apache Camel helps you integrate various systems consuming or producing data.

title: Camel K
desc: Apache Camel K is a lightweight integration framework that runs natively on Kubernetes.

title: Camel Quarkus
desc: Apache Camel Quarkus packages 280+ Camel components as Quarkus extensions.

title: Camel Kafka Connector
desc: Apache Camel Kafka Connector embeds Camel within Kafka Connect.

title: Camel Spring Boot
desc: Apache Camel Spring Boot runs Camel on Spring Boot and provides starters for Camel components.

title: Camel Karaf
desc: Apache Camel Karaf makes running Camel in the OSGi container.

title: Camel Karavan
desc: Apache Camel Karavan is a mastering tool to facilitate integration and speed up development through the process visualization.

title: Camel JBang
desc: The Camel CLI for easily getting started with Apache Camel.
